body:
Hi James et al, 
 
I am just using QTMovie because I need to draw the contents of the 
movie into a bitmap. So I am grabbing the NSImage of the current frame 
and using that. 
 
Is QTMovie dependant on QTMovieView for events in some fashion? 
 
 
 
thx 
 
bill appleton 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
On Tue, May 18, 2010 at 12:51 PM, James Walker wrote: 
> On 5/18/2010 11:55 AM, Bill Appleton wrote: 
> 
>> i am using cocoa and QTMovie to open and play valid movie files 
> 
> Are you using QTMovieView, or QTMovieLayer, or what? 
> 
> -- 
>  James W. Walker, Innoventive Software LLC 
>
